Text: Olivia has let you know she has found huge new client| but she has some concerns.

Speaker: You
Text: What are your concerns about this new client?

Speaker: Oliva
Text: They have a dubious background.  They are under investigation for defrauding the shareholders.

Speaker: You
Text: Have they been charged for anything?

Speaker: Olivia
Text: Two years ago they were fined for having planned obsilecense in their product.

Speaker: Olivia
Text: But the current investigation is still ongoing.

Speaker: You
Text: So you're worried that we'd be helping an amoral company?

Speaker: Olivia
Text: Exactly| but they are offering a massive amount of new business.
